unnormalised: mhojea bhurgeak 2 disam than fever asa, doctor Mehra-n paracetamol syrup suchoila, dor 6 voramni 5ml. Ummed asa tem upkarta mhunn, bichareak fokot 6 mhoine zaleat!
normalised: Mhaka don disam thaun zhor asa, Doctor Mehra-n paracetamol syrup suchoyla, panch milliliter dor eka so horanim. Ashaa asa faida zat mhunn, bicharyak fokot so mhoine zalyat!
